info.name: Ventura Dark Google Chat
info.description: This style allows you to use your google chat in Dark mode, it does not alter the original structure of the chat, only the colors were modified.
info.additionalInfo:
Here you can find the repository where the code for this theme is hosted.

https://github.com/Alorse/GO-Ventura-Google-Chat

GO Ventura Google Chat v0.3.3 — July 28, 2020 New Google Chat Style
